extendedInfo.description: My-Cast. Your Weather. No waiting. My-Cast Weather brings you the classic features of our award winning weather app in a totally re-designed Android user experience.  Get access to critical weather information wherever you are with My-Cast.View animated radar, clouds, current conditions, hourly and extended forecasts, severe weather alerts and more. Quickly check the weather with an easy-to-interpret graphic display and dynamic weather themes.  Share weather with Facebook and Twitter.Unique to My-Cast Weather (paid version):â¢ No Adsâ¢ Tropical Storm Tracking - View NHC forecast maps and data for hurricanes and tropical stormsâ¢ Widgets: Radar, IR and Visible Satellite Widgetsâ¢ StormWatch Mapâ¢ Background Updates - Set how often widgets and status bar are updated.***************NOW AVAILABLE: My-Cast Premium Severe Weather Upgrade PackageWith an In-App purchase, you can subscribe to:â¢ Watch up-to-the-minute lightning strikes animate across a map!â¢ Severe Weather Push Alerts â Receive Lightning & NWS alerts to your device as soon as they are issued.***************My-Cast also includes:â¢ My-Cast dashboard allows you to quickly view your favorite features in one glanceâ¢ Current condition displays in status bar and notification areaâ¢ Forecast conditions including hour by hour, detailed daily descriptionâ¢ Interactive forecast graph allows you to visualize seven different types of weather data for the next 7 daysâ¢ Complete redesign of severe weather alert functionality, including main page event notification and full interactive text descriptionâ¢ Full screen landscape displays for maps and graphsâ¢ Full support for pinch-zoom gestures in all mapsâ¢ Ability to change app skin color for personalized look and feelâ¢ Theme graphics to display current weather conditionsâ¢ Forecast WidgetRelease notes 1.3.2 - Oct 11 2011---------------------------------Fixes and Improvements:â¢ Fixed bug where forecast graph widget might crash on some locations.â¢ Other Minor bug fixes and improvements.Release notes 1.3.1 - Sept 23 2011------------Bug Fixes and Improvements:â¢ Display issues on the Galaxy Tab have been resolvedâ¢ Clicking the Facebook link in the social section now opens the Facebook website in browserâ¢ Better support for displaying nearby citiesâ¢ Fixed issue where forecast was showing incorrect data when using the mobile location in some cases.Release notes 1.3.0 - Sept 8 2011------------New Features:â¢ Tropical Weather Updateâ¢ New Map - Tropical Map displays current stormsBug Fixes and Improvements:â¢ Improved stability in maps and other areasâ¢ Fix Facebook shareRelease notes 1.2.0 - August 24 2011---------------New Features:â¢ StormWatch Map - Shows current National Weather Service watches, warnings, alerts and advisories.â¢ Bingâ¢ Aerial and Bingâ¢ Roads basemap options for maps.â¢ Transparency slider for overlays. Use the slider on the left side of the map to turn down the brightness of the weather overlays.â¢ Yesterday's precipitation totals. This is now displayed under yesterday's high and low in the Currents page.â¢ Moon phase. This shows the current phase at the bottom of the Currents page.â¢ My-Cast Market. This page is available from the menu button under "Subscriptions". It displays all available My-Cast premium subscription add-ons.â¢ Lightning Strike Map. Available as part of the Severe Weather Upgrade Package - This will show current lightning strikes as a layer option in the map.â¢ Push Alerts. Also part of the Severe Weather Upgrade Package, this feature uses the Google push service to push severe weather alerts (and lightning strikes) to your phone the moment they are issued. The alerts show up in the Android notification area and can be configured with a special ringtone. Push Alerts can be set for each location in the location list.

reviews.title: Not much use in my area
reviews.comment: Forecasted temps are always completely wrong.  It is currently over 90 degrees but forecast page still says high of 85.  Radar seems to be the only useful part of ap.  Tech support wasn\'t any use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Special features don\'t work, even with paid subscription...
reviews.comment: No updates since Oct 2011. Need a UI refresh. Radar widget has never worked right on my last 3 phones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please help me
reviews.comment: I paid the $9.99 for the lightning and text alert upgrade and they worked wonderfully, however, since getting my phone replaced with the same phone, I redownloaded this app fully expecting to receive the total app for which I have already paid. Please tell me how to get back on my phone what I paid for. I\'ve yet to find a code to reinstall. Thanks
reviews.author: Daniel Henson

reviews.title: Not bad at all
reviews.comment: I do have to agree with others that the map should be a different color so as to show ground details better. Neighborhood level would make it perfect. And don\'t need social garbage on weather app. Otherwise, I got rid of weather bug elite for this one. Works great on Droid X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: Paid for the app. Does not auto load on phone start. Needs an up date and developer said he was aware of the issue. Using Galaxy 3S.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Reliable and accurate. I work in the middle of nowhere and have relied on this app for the last two years and it never lets me down! Worth the money!!
reviews.author: Tia Druskis

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: Do not purchase this app. Currently, partly cloudy, and I\'m looking at stars. Forecast said it would start raining @ 2am here -it\'s 209am, now it says the rain will start @ 3am --unless this storm, over central Iowa, is traveling at over 280 miles per hour, no way it will make it to Chicago in 45 min...garbage. I regret purchasing.
reviews.author: Jon Green

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Destroys battery life if its allowed to run in the status bar.  Other unpaid apps are just as good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only 1 glitch
reviews.comment: I used to own the Thunderbolt and this app was perfect.  Now I own the Motorola droid RAZR MAXX and the radar map causes my phone to lock up.  All other areas in the app seem to work fine but the radar will cause my phone to lock as I zoom in.
reviews.author: Earl Harrison

reviews.title: Best Radar of any of the apps
reviews.comment: This app has always impressed me, even in it\'s Java-only feature phone days.  One gripe, I\'ve bought this app, and it\'s lightening plug in more than once, because they updated the app yet didn\'t carry over your purchase history.  Kinda low-brow to do.  Why didn\'t they just update the old app?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must for the weather nut.
reviews.comment: Always had My Cast on  my cell since 2006. One of the best weather apps on the market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top notch developer
reviews.comment: Great app from a fantastic and responsive development team. Brandon Plantage esta bien padre! WAND!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Very fast, and I do like the trending with temps and other things. The maps animate a bit better than the weather bug app. The only reason I didn\'t give 5 stars is the home screen widgets could be better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Note II bug?
reviews.comment: Loved the app on my Droid. Samsung Note II does not update current location.  :(
reviews.author: Tammy Kulaga-Souza

reviews.title: NEEDS UPDATE
reviews.comment: RADAR LAGS ALOT ....WE PAID $$ AND SHOULD GET UPDATES
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widgets don\'t update correctly
reviews.comment: 90% of what I need are displayed on the widgets. However, the widgets don\'t update properly.  This may be a more recent issue because I don\'t recall this problem when I first loaded the app. Just to be fair I noticed other weather widgets doing the same thing,  The only difference is I paid for this app as well as the severe weather data subscriptions. Not particularly pleased.
reviews.author: Larry Paris

reviews.title: Dennis
reviews.comment: From my Motorola RAZR flip phone through Windows Phone, BlackBerry, DX and now SGS3 this app just works.  I keep looking for a better weather app but nothing touches MyCast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too much battery use
reviews.comment: Awesome app but uses way too much battery on Verizon Galaxy Nexus...even more than my screen was. Uninstall until update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I want Classic
reviews.comment: What happened to the Classic 7.1.1 version? Its not in the Google play store. That version was much better.  The radar widget does not update frequently enough.
reviews.author: Nate Nazdrowicz

reviews.comment: Weather is up to date but since the last update radar will not open....i hate bing
reviews.author: A Google User
